titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Frederick S. McMurray papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.originalsloc: Originals in: State University of New York, Maritime College Library.

archdesc.bioghist: Sailor in the Philippine Islands, later employee with the Philippine Steamship Company.
archdesc.scopecontent: Letters to his mother describing activities and commenting on society, politics, and life in the Philippines.
